## Matrix.inverse() function

Compute the inverse of an invertible matrix.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Invertible\_matrix](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Invertible_matrix) [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cramers\_rule](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cramers_rule)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function inverse(m: Matrix): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  m | [Matrix](./alfa-math.matrix_typealias.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Matrix](./alfa-math.matrix_typealias.md)

## Remarks

This function uses Cramer's rule for computing the inverse which has a time complexity of O(n!) and is therefore not practical for large matrices.
